    • Method Detail

      • getSpecies

        public static Species getSpecies(CellBaseConfiguration configuration,
                                 String userProvidedSpecies,
                                 String userProvidedAssembly)
                          throws CellbaseException
        Return species object based on species name and assembly. If assembly is not provided, default assembly is used (the first one listed in the config file)
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration file listing the valid species and assemblies
        userProvidedSpecies - name of species, e.g. Homo sapiens or hsapiens
        userProvidedAssembly - assembly version
        Returns:
        species object
        Throws:
        CellbaseException - if the species or assembly is invalid

      • getSpeciesConfiguration

        public static SpeciesConfiguration getSpeciesConfiguration(CellBaseConfiguration configuration,
                                                           String species)
        Get configuration for the specified species.
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration for this cellbase instance
        species - species of interest, e.g. hsapiens or Homo sapiens
        Returns:
        configuration for given species

      • getAssembly

        public static SpeciesConfiguration.Assembly getAssembly(SpeciesConfiguration speciesConfiguration,
                                                        String assemblyString)
        Check given assembly is valid, case insensitve. NULL if invalid assembly.
        Parameters:
        speciesConfiguration - configuration entry for this species
        assemblyString - name of assembly
        Returns:
        the assembly name OR NULL of no assembly found.

      • getDefaultAssembly

        public static SpeciesConfiguration.Assembly getDefaultAssembly(SpeciesConfiguration speciesConfiguration)
                                                        throws CellbaseException
        Get the default assembly for species. Is naive and just gets the first one. Order not guaranteed, don't rely on this at all.
        Parameters:
        speciesConfiguration - configuration entry for this species
        Returns:
        the default assembly
        Throws:
        CellbaseException - if the species has no associated assembly

      • getSpeciesShortname

        public static String getSpeciesShortname(SpeciesConfiguration speciesConfiguration)
        Formats the species name, e.g. Homo sapiens to hsapiens. Used in the download for the species directory.
        Parameters:
        speciesConfiguration - configuration entry for this species
        Returns:
        formatted species name
